name: Gauntlet: the darkness within
description:
A sequel to gauntlet! this time more darker! more sinister! and huge improvements in performance and playability! enjoy this dark quake inspired shooter!

What can you expect?

- more darker levels compared to gauntlet! 

- even better soundtracks in my opinion to gauntlet!

- choose your difficulty from easy to hard to nightmare! want a challenge? try nightmare difficulty !

- on nightmare mode you only get 1 medkit per level!

- find all the secrets to get more ammo and health kits!

-now able to load and save game properly this time!

IF YOU LIKE GAUNTLET YOU WILL LIKE THIS ONE!!

I hope all who purchase this game will like and enjoy it thank you!

Like this game? please checkout my other games!
